long_description: Consider the Kuhl Rydr pants a prerequisite to your outdoor-inspired lifestyle. Whether you're pounding nails, chopping wood or walking the dog, they'll bring a rugged look to your casual wear. Prewashed cotton stretch twill fabric is naturally soft and breathable; a touch of stretch enhances comfort. Classic 5-pocket design holds your everyday essentials; small welt pocket on the right side stashes your cell phone. Articulated knees allow comfortable range of motion with no tugging. Reinforced rear cuffs deliver extra durability to a high-wear area.
short_description: Consider the Kuhl Rydr pants a prerequisite to your outdoor-inspired lifestyle. Whether you're pounding nails, chopping wood or walking the dog, they'll bring a rugged look to your casual wear.
